Toggle Menu

salt.modules.gem

Manage ruby gems.

install

Syntax

salt.modules.gem.install(
								gems,
								ruby=None,
								gem_bin=None,
								runas=None,
								version=None,
								rdoc=False,
								ri=False,
								pre_releases=False,
								proxy=None
								)

Installs one or several gems.

Arguments

Name Description
gems

The gems to install
gem_bin

Full path to gem binary to use.

ruby

If RVM or rbenv are installed, the ruby version and gemset to use. Ignored if gem_bin is specified.

runas

The user to run gem as.
version

Specify the version to install for the gem. Doesn't play nice with multiple gems at once

rdoc

Generate RDoc documentation for the gem(s).
ri

Generate RI documentation for the gem(s).
pre_releases

Include pre-releases in the available versions
proxy

Use the specified HTTP proxy server for all outgoing traffic. Format: http://hostname[:port]

Details

CLI Example:

salt '*' gem.install vagrant

salt '*' gem.install redphone gem_bin=/opt/sensu/embedded/bin/gem

list_

Syntax

salt.modules.gem.list_(
								prefix='',
								ruby=None,
								runas=None,
								gem_bin=None
								)

List locally installed gems.

Arguments

Name Description
prefix :

Only list gems when the name matches this prefix.
gem_bin

Full path to gem binary to use.

ruby

If RVM or rbenv are installed, the ruby version and gemset to use. Ignored if gem_bin is specified.

runas

The user to run gem as.

Details

CLI Example:

salt '*' gem.list

sources_add

Syntax

salt.modules.gem.sources_add(
								source_uri,
								ruby=None,
								runas=None,
								gem_bin=None
								)

Add a gem source.

Arguments

Name Description
source_uri

The source URI to add.
gem_bin

Full path to gem binary to use.

ruby

If RVM or rbenv are installed, the ruby version and gemset to use. Ignored if gem_bin is specified.

runas

The user to run gem as.

Details

CLI Example:

salt '*' gem.sources_add http://rubygems.org/

Syntax

salt.modules.gem.sources_list(
								ruby=None,
								runas=None,
								gem_bin=None
								)

List the configured gem sources.

Arguments

Name Description
gem_bin

Full path to gem binary to use.

ruby

If RVM or rbenv are installed, the ruby version and gemset to use. Ignored if gem_bin is specified.

runas

The user to run gem as.

Details

CLI Example:

update_system

Syntax

								version='',
								ruby=None,
								runas=None,
								gem_bin=None
								)

Update rubygems.

Arguments

Name Description
version

The version of rubygems to install.
gem_bin

Full path to gem binary to use.

ruby

If RVM or rbenv are installed, the ruby version and gemset to use. Ignored if gem_bin is specified.

runas

The user to run gem as.

Details
